name: SSF20
title: Site-Specific Factor 20
subtitle: Assessment of Positive Distant Metastases
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code the assessment method used for determining the presence of metastasis as coded in the Clinical M and Path M fields.   
* If there are no mets (cM0), this field must be coded 000

**Note 2:**  If multiple methods of assessments determined positive metastases, use the highest code that applies.
rows: No clinical or radiographic evidence of distant metastasis, but deposits of molecularly or microscopically detected tumor cells in circulating blood, bone marrow or other non-regional nodal tissue that are 0.2 millimeters (mm) or less in a patient without symptoms or signs of metastasis
Physical examination or laboratory tests only

Radiography,imaging:
    Ultrasound (US)
    Computed tomography scan (CT)
    Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI)
    Positron emission tomography scan (PET)
Excisional biopsy or resection with microscopic confirmation
Not applicable: Information not collected for this case

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
